t: Delpozo partners with Chalhoub Group for Middle East expansion - Fashionnetwork.com us
s: June 27, 2018 - Spanish designer brand Delpozo, owned by Perfumes y Diseño, is set to expand its business in the Middle East thanks to a new partnership deal with Dubai-based Chalhoub Group, which will become the exclusive representative for the brand in the region from the Spring/Summer 2019 season.
